datetime_format.name: datetime_format
datetime_format.description: The format of the datetime strings. Default is '%d.%m.%Y %H:%M'. d .. day, m .. month, y .. Year, H .. hour, M .. minute

unit_from_entity.name: unit_from_entity
unit_from_entity.description: True: Take unit from existing entity (only valid for internal statistics, e.g. sensor.sun_solar_azimuth); False: Take unit from own column in imported data

import_from_file.name: Import statistics from file

export_statistics.name: Export Statistics
export_statistics.description: Exports long term statistic values (1h) to a tsv/csv or a json file

filename.name: filename
filename.description: Filename relative to config directory (e.g., 'exported.tsv' or 'myData.json')

entities.name: entities
entities.description: List of statistic IDs or entity IDs to export (supports both internal and external). Make sure to use a Yaml list with '- '

start_time.name: start_time
start_time.description: The start time for statistics export in the format %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S (must be full hour, e.g. '2025-12-22 12:00:00'). Make sure to use quotes around the timestamp in Yaml.

end_time.name: end_time
end_time.description: The end time for statistics export in the format %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S (must be full hour, e.g. '2025-12-22 12:00:00'). Make sure to use quotes around the timestamp in Yaml.

timezone_identifier.name: timezone_identifier
timezone_identifier.description: Timezone identifier for start/end-time and timestamp output formatting (check pytz timezones or https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones)

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.description: The delimiter between fields. Default is tab; options are tab, semicolon, comma, or pipe

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: The decimal separator. Default is '.'/dot; set to true to use ','/comma

datetime_format.name: datetime_format
datetime_format.description: The format of the datetime strings in the exported file. Default is '%d.%m.%Y %H:%M'. d .. day, m .. month, y .. Year, H .. hour, M .. minute
